RESPONSIVE WEB DEVELOPMENT

City Strategy Group, an NYC management consultancy, hired our team to design, develop and deploy their new website.

Multi-Framework Development

We integrated multiple languages including WordPress and Node.js to allow the CSG partners to post content through a portal they were comfortable with (WordPress) without sacrificing customization, speed or performance.

CROSS-FRAMEWORK DEVELOPMENT

We integrated multiple languages including WordPress and Node.js to allow the CSG partners to post content through a portal they were comfortable with (WordPress) without sacrificing customization, speed or performance.
